attributes.title: messed up my life!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: As a 386 year old homosexual half hispanic half african muslim democratic icelandic russian arabian transgender vegan iguana owner, i downloaded the app to see how much the cheetos were selling for because i heard there was good prices- i was not expecting an orange fat man to pop up on my screen! While he indeed did look like a cheeto, i was immediately petrified and turned to stone like that one harry potter movie. Then hagrid came and poured polyjuice unstoning potion on me and i came back alive!!!! While i was going to my attorneyâ€™s office i was rear ended by a short cheeto in a tux on his way back from a tulsa rally, apparently he was crying a lot. Well anyways i got his license plate as he drove away like nothing happened (his plate number is â€œCHEETO PEN15â€) and then i opened my phone to call my attorney and then i saw an atrocious NAKED PICTURE of the cheeto getting a  spray tan!! I did not know what to think of this so hagrid took me on his broom to my attorney, where we then were going to sue this cheeto for ruining my life!!! Anyways we then realized this was the president of a stupid place called the USA which was built on stolen land after being taken over by a racist who was now being ruled by an ignorant rude racist islamiphobic homophobic sexist rapist guy who has 24 rape allegations and even more sexual harassment allegations with evidence and then theres there part where he is racist and a white supremacist and he thinks muslims are terrorists and he doesnt know how to run a country nevermind the fact that he made fun of a disabled person in front of everybody and has been heard making many sexist remarks, not to mention how much he is a transphobe and how much he has neglected the LGBTQI+ community and then claimed he loves them, meanwhile disrespecting the american flag by putting it on multiple pieces of merchandise, all the while being shadowed by his many supporters that only can speak â€œthat was taken out of contextâ€ and â€œsnowflakeâ€ and â€œtrump 2020 ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸â€ which is a very awkward language that i dont support, omg and i heard he is a child trafficker but i wont even get into that. Not gonna lie this hot cheeto did has done a lot of bad things to the stupid place called the USA, and i mean more good things than bad!!! In my country iceland there has been 1 death by police since 1945, meanwhile in 2019 alone there were 1030 deaths by police. Um anyways so i went home crying and deleted the app this has been the worse day ever thanks to stupid cheeto!!!!!!!! Dont download this app it will ruin your life i recommend using tiktok because tiktok is nothing but facts. I am now running for president to get this cheeto out of the oval office!!!!! Anyways bye guys, dont get cheetoed like i did!

attributes.title: The worst app on the apple App Store
attributes.review: If I could give this app zero stars, I would. It is simply the worst app ever created and published for people to see. First, it is all propaganda and FAKE NEWS. If Hitler had an app, it would be just like this one. Second, it looks like it was designed by a second grader at a STEM school whoâ€™s final project was to code an app. I seriously think my senile grandpa has better graphic design skills. Third, I opened the app for the first time and immediately closed it because I was so horrified and disgusted by the picture of Trump i first saw. Overall, this app was a HORRIBLE experience and I discourage anyone from downloading it. Absolutely disgusting, sad, and pathetic. If you want an app full of lies, fake news, and information about where you can go to see trump and contract COVID, this app is for you. For everyone that is not an absolutely incompetent moron, do not download this app.
